entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
